text: Kopriva may refer to: ==Places== * Kopriva, Razkrižje, a small settlement in the Municipality of Razkrižje in eastern Slovenia * Kopriva, Sežana, a village in the Municipality of Sežana in the Littoral region of Slovenia * Kopriva Peak, rocky peak in Graham Land, Antarctica ==People with the surname== * Juan Carlos Kopriva, Argentine footballer == See also == * Kopřiva, Czech surname * Koprivnica
title: Kopriva
